description: This file provides environment configuration helpers for a React frontend application. It reads environment variables set at build time to produce runtime configuration values, including API URLs, WebSocket URLs, feature flags, and environment type.

methods.name: parseFeatureFlags(raw)
methods.description: Parses feature flags from a raw environment variable, supporting JSON object format or comma-separated string format.

methods.name: getRuntimeConfig()
methods.description: Exports a function that gathers environment variables and returns a configuration object with runtime settings.
